item.title: Pimai
item.author: gupta.karan.11@gmail.com (Karan Gupta)
item.description: Since August 2018, over the course of No Mames trip we have been to 10 countries and have been fortunate enough to experience cultural festivals of some of these countries. Through this post we plan to relive Pi Mai festival of Laos ðŸ˜„ What is it about Lao New Year is called ‘Songkran’ or ‘Pi Mai’ in Lao. It is based on the traditional solar new year, that was observed in parts of India and Asia.
